repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:alpine 

RUN apk --update --no-cache add git \
&& go get github.com/mpolden/ipd/...

FROM alpine:latest 
# RUN apk --no-cache add ca-certificates \ 
COPY \--from=0 /go/bin/ipd /bin/ipd 

EXPOSE 8080 
COPY docker-entrypoint.sh / 
ENTRYPOINT ["/docker-entrypoint.sh"] 
CMD ["ipd"]
